title: Remake System Troubleshooting!
body:
Hello Support, 

I would love if someone could get back to me on this topic, because I am very confused. 

I played a ranked game earlier, I was Kog'Maw in case you wanted to look it up in reference. (https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=big+boy+bolge)

So, Myself, the jungler and support were waiting at the blue buff for it to spawn so that we could leash, then my support disconnects at 1:11 into the game. "Oh well" I say, expecting to be able to create a Remake vote shortly after, only to my dismay do I find that I cannot start a remake vote. The game plays out and we almost win 4v5 as Soraka doesn't once reconnect throughout the whole game. 

This is frustrating considering i'm trying to climb/win and a feature that is meant to resolve this kind of issue for some reason isn't working. After the game, I took to a Facebook group i'm apart of asking for suggestions as to why this is the case. Someone stated that a player has to be disconnected for 90 seconds before the 3 minute mark of the game. So, using the new client I went back and watched the game to find that Soraka disconnected at 1:11 as stated above. I also then checked to see that no one on my team got first blood before 3 minutes. I also, looked up Riot's definition of the guidlines that must occur for a remake to become available and from what I can tell, everything that happened/didn't happen in the game should have been eligible for a remake. (http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/play-games-matter/remake) 

So, I sit here, incredibly frustrated about why I couldn't remake and then as to why there is even the option if the most obvious cases are not permitted to let the system work correctly. 

I would love some insight into this issue.
